languages.text: "На нижних палубах полно темных уголков, где ксеносы могут затаиться. А сами простолюдины слишком тупы и слабовольны, чтобы вовремя распознать угрозу. Но достаточно тупы и слабовольны, чтобы стать пушечным мясом, которое генокульт бросит на своих врагов, подняв бунт".

"The lower decks have plenty of dark corners for the xenos to lie in wait. Commoners are too dull-witted and spineless to identify the threat before it is too late. And at the same time, they are dull-witted and spineless enough to serve as cannon fodder to be thrown at the cult's enemies when the uprising begins."
languages.original_text: "На нижних палубах полно темных уголков, где ксеносы могут затаиться. А сами простолюдины слишком тупы и слабовольны, чтобы вовремя распознать угрозу. Но достаточно тупы и слабовольны, чтобы стать пушечным мясом, которое генокульт бросит на своих врагов, подняв бунт".

traits.locale_text: "The lower decks have plenty of dark corners for the xenos to lie in wait. Commoners are too thick and spineless to identify the threat before it is too late. And at the same time, they are thick and spineless enough to serve as cannon fodder to be thrown at the cult's enemies when the uprising begins."

And at the same time, they are thick and spineless enough to serve as cannon fodder to be thrown at the cult's enemies when the uprising begins."

And at the same time, they are dull-witted and spineless enough to serve as cannon fodder to be thrown at the cult's enemies when the uprising begins."

And at the same time, they are dull-witted and spineless enough to serve as cannon fodder to be thrown at the cult's enemies when the uprising begins."

And at the same time, they are dull-witted and spineless enough to serve as cannon fodder to be thrown at the cult's enemies when the uprising begins."

"The lower decks have plenty of dark corners for the xenos to lie in wait. Commoners are too dull-witted and spineless to identify the threat before it is too late. And at the same time, they are dull-witted and spineless enough to serve as cannon fodder to be thrown at the cult's enemies when the uprising begins."

"The lower decks have plenty of dark corners for the xenos to lie in wait. Commoners are too dull-witted and spineless to identify the threat before it is too late. And at the same time, they are dull-witted and spineless enough to serve as cannon fodder to be thrown at the cult's enemies when the uprising begins."

languages.text: “因为底层甲板有许多阴暗的角落，可供那些异形进行埋伏。底层平民过于愚钝，又欠缺胆识，根本无法及时发现威胁。不仅如此，那些人既愚蠢、又怯懦，当暴乱爆发的时候，那群人会被最先当成炮灰，丢向邪教的敌人。”
languages.original_text: "The lower decks have plenty of dark corners for the xenos to lie in wait. Commoners are too dull-witted and spineless to identify the threat before it is too late. And at the same time, they are dull-witted and spineless enough to serve as cannon fodder to be thrown at the cult's enemies when the uprising begins."

traits.locale_text: “因为底层甲板有许多阴暗的角落，可供那些异形进行埋伏。底层平民过于愚钝，又欠缺胆识，根本无法及时发现威胁。不仅如此，那些人既愚蠢、又怯懦，当暴乱爆发的时候，那群人会被最先当成炮灰，丢向邪教的敌人。”

languages.text: «En las cubiertas inferiores hay muchos rincones oscuros donde estos xenos pueden acechar a la espera. Los plebeyos son demasiado necios y cobardes para identificar la amenaza antes de que sea demasiado tarde. Y al mismo tiempo, son lo bastante necios y cobardes para servir como carne de cañón que el culto envía contra sus enemigos cuando al fin comienza la sublevación».
languages.original_text: "The lower decks have plenty of dark corners for the xenos to lie in wait. Commoners are too dull-witted and spineless to identify the threat before it is too late. And at the same time, they are dull-witted and spineless enough to serve as cannon fodder to be thrown at the cult's enemies when the uprising begins."

traits.locale_text: «En las cubiertas inferiores hay muchos rincones oscuros donde estos xenos pueden acechar a la espera. Los plebeyos son demasiado necios y cobardes para identificar la amenaza antes de que sea demasiado tarde. Y al mismo tiempo, son lo bastante necios y cobardes para servir como carne de cañón que el culto envía contra sus enemigos cuando al fin comienza la sublevación».

languages.text: 「下層デッキには、異種族が待ち伏せる暗い場所がたくさんあります。平民は、手遅れになる前に脅威を察知するには、あまりに頭が悪く意気地がない。そして同時に、彼らは反乱が始まったときにカルトの敵に投げつけられる大砲の餌になってしまうほど頭が悪く、意気地がないのです」
languages.original_text: "The lower decks have plenty of dark corners for the xenos to lie in wait. Commoners are too dull-witted and spineless to identify the threat before it is too late. And at the same time, they are dull-witted and spineless enough to serve as cannon fodder to be thrown at the cult's enemies when the uprising begins."

traits.locale_text: 「下層デッキには、異種族が待ち伏せる暗い場所がたくさんあります。平民は、手遅れになる前に脅威を察知するには、あまりに頭が悪く意気地がない。そして同時に、彼らは反乱が始まったときにカルトの敵に投げつけられる大砲の餌になってしまうほど頭が悪く、意気地がないのです」

languages.text: Auf den unteren Decks gibt es viele dunkle Ecken, in denen die Xenos ausharren können. Das gemeine Volk ist zu einfältig und rückgratlos, um eine Gefahr zu erkennen, ehe es zu spät ist. Gleichzeitig ist es aber einfältig und rückgratlos genug, um als Kanonenfutter auf die Feinde des Kultes gehetzt zu werden, wenn der Aufstand beginnt."
languages.original_text: "The lower decks have plenty of dark corners for the xenos to lie in wait. Commoners are too dull-witted and spineless to identify the threat before it is too late. And at the same time, they are dull-witted and spineless enough to serve as cannon fodder to be thrown at the cult's enemies when the uprising begins."

traits.locale_text: Auf den unteren Decks gibt es viele dunkle Ecken, in denen die Xenos ausharren können. Das gemeine Volk ist zu einfältig und rückgratlos, um eine Gefahr zu erkennen, ehe es zu spät ist. Gleichzeitig ist es aber einfältig und rückgratlos genug, um als Kanonenfutter auf die Feinde des Kultes gehetzt zu werden, wenn der Aufstand beginnt."

languages.text: « Les ponts inférieurs sont truffés de recoins sombres où les xénos peuvent se tapir en attendant leur heure. Les gueux sont trop bêtes et lâches pour identifier la menace avant qu'il ne soit trop tard, mais ils le sont juste assez pour servir de chair à canon contre les ennemis de la secte lorsque la révolte s'embrase. »
languages.original_text: "The lower decks have plenty of dark corners for the xenos to lie in wait. Commoners are too dull-witted and spineless to identify the threat before it is too late. And at the same time, they are dull-witted and spineless enough to serve as cannon fodder to be thrown at the cult's enemies when the uprising begins."

Les gueux sont trop bêtes et lâches pour identifier la menace avant qu'il ne soit trop tard, mais ils le sont juste assez pour servir de chair à canon contre les ennemis de la secte lorsque la révolte s'embrase. »

languages.text: "Alt güvertelerde zenoların pusuda bekleyebileceği pek çok karanlık köşe mevcut. Sıradan yurttaşlar, bu tehdidi iş işten geçmeden algılayamayacak kadar ahmak ve korkak. Aynı zamanda ateşe atılarak hizmet edecek kadar da ahmak ve korkaklar. Ayaklanma başladığında tarikatın düşmanlarının üstüne piyon gibi salınacaklar."
languages.original_text: "The lower decks have plenty of dark corners for the xenos to lie in wait. Commoners are too dull-witted and spineless to identify the threat before it is too late. And at the same time, they are dull-witted and spineless enough to serve as cannon fodder to be thrown at the cult's enemies when the uprising begins."
